outline.text: MODULE-1 (XHTML)
1. Develop and demonstrate a XHTML file that creates a College web site with forms, frames, links, tables.
2. Design a Shopping web site using HTML and DHTML. Use Basic text Formatting, Images.
3. Design a Ticket Booking Web site using XHTML , Use various level of CSS.
MODULE-2 (HTML-5)
1. Develop and demonstrate a XHTML file with Canvas and local storage concepts.
2. Demonstrate XHTML Sections.
3. Develop and demonstrate a XHTML file that creates a Computer Science Book repository website with XHTML forms.
MODULE-3 (JAVASCRIPT)
1. Develop and demonstrate a XHTML file that includes Javascript script for the following problems:
a) INPUT: A number n obtained using prompt OUTPUT: The first n Fibonacci numbers
b) INPUT: A number n obtained using prompt OUTPUT: A table of numbers from 1 to n and their squares using alert box.
2. a) XHTML document to collect and validate USN using Javascript
b) Modify the above program to get the current semester also (restricted to be a number from 1 to 8)
3. a) XHTML document with 3 paragraphs stacked; mouseover brings one to top
b) Modify to restore paragraph to original position when moved
MODULE-4 (PHP Programming)
1. PHP program to store current date-time in a COOKIE and display 'Last visited on'
2. PHP program to store page views count in SESSION and increment on each refresh
3. PHP program to insert user input into MySQL table and display contents
MODULE-5 (XML)
1. XML document for student information with CSS styling
2. Create an XSLT style sheet for a student element
3. Demonstrate jQuery serialize() method
